page.title: 11WINDRUSH VILLAGE HALL
page.content: Coming into Windrush from Sherborne there is a small building that is used as the village hall. The village hall is used for jumble sales,about two or three times a year.There are teas,cakes,biscuits, raffles,toys and books for sale.The money goes for the village hall when it needs repairing.It was an old school.You can tell because there's a bell built into the wall of the village hall.Two toilets and a kitchen have been built after the school was closed.When the school was open the toilets were out side.The village hall is built of Cotswold stone and the roof is built of slates. The village hall is also used for discos and childrens parties.
